This is a sample text file for testing HexWarden encryption and decryption functionality.

It contains multiple lines of text with various characters:
- ASCII characters: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789
- Special characters: !@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':\",./<>?
- Unicode characters: αβγδε ñáéíóú 中文 日本語 русский

This file is designed to test:
1. Basic text encryption/decryption
2. Character encoding preservation
3. Multi-line content handling
4. Various character sets

The content is intentionally varied to ensure comprehensive testing of the encryption system.
